CIALIS For Use As Needed For Erectile Dysfunction. 1  The recommended starting dose of CIALIS for use as needed in most patients is 10 mg, taken prior to anticipated sexual activity. 2  The dose may be increased to 20 mg or decreased to 5 mg, based on individual efficacy and tolerability.

1 For most patients the recommended starting dose is 10 mg as needed prior to anticipated sexual activity. 2  The dose may be increased to 20 mg or decreased to 5 mg based on efficacy or tolerability. 3  The maximum dosing frequency is once daily for most patients. 4  Cialis is effective for up to 36 hours.

Alternatively, Cialis can be taken on a daily basis (every single day, whether you plan sexual activity or not). For this use, the recommended dose is Cialis 2.5 mg once daily, taken at the same time each day (it does not matter when you plan to have sexual activity if you take Cialis this way).

CYP3A4 Inhibitors. CIALIS for Use as Needed — For patients taking concomitant potent inhibitors of CYP3A4, such as ketoconazole or ritonavir, the maximum recommended dose of CIALIS is 10 mg, not to exceed once every 72 hours [see WARNINGS AND PRECAUTIONS and DRUG INTERACTIONS ].
